6: וַיִּצְמַ֡ח <sup>6779 </sup> <n>And it grew</n> וַיְהִי֩ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>and became</n> לְגֶ֨פֶן <sup>1612 </sup> <n>vine</n> סֹרַ֜חַת <sup>5628 </sup> <n>and became a spreading</n> שִׁפְלַ֣ת <sup>8217 </sup> <n>of low</n> קוֹמָ֗ה <sup>6967 </sup> <n>stature</n> לִפְנ֤וֹת <sup>6437 </sup> <n>turned</n> דָּלִיּוֹתָיו֙ <sup>1808 </sup> <n>whose branches</n> אֵלָ֔יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>toward</n> וְשָׁרָשָׁ֖יו <sup>8328 </sup> <n>toward him and the roots</n> תַּחְתָּ֣יו <sup>8478 </sup> <n>under</n> יִֽהְי֑וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>remained</n> וַתְּהִ֣י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>became</n> לְגֶ֔פֶן <sup>1612 </sup> <n>thereof were under him so it became a vine</n> וַתַּ֣עַשׂ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and brought forth</n> בַּדִּ֔ים <sup>905 </sup> <n>branches</n> וַתְּשַׁלַּ֖ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>and shot</n> פֹּארֽוֹת׃ <sup>6288 </sup> <n>forth sprigs</n>
7: וַיְהִ֤י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> נֶֽשֶׁר־ <sup>5404 </sup> <n>eagle</n> אֶחָד֙ <sup>259 </sup> <n>There was also another</n> גָּד֔וֹל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>great</n> גְּד֥וֹל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>with great</n> כְּנָפַ֖יִם <sup>3671 </sup> <n>wings</n> וְרַב־ <sup>7227 </sup> <n>and many</n> נוֹצָ֑ה <sup>5133 </sup> <n>feathers</n> וְהִנֵּה֩ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>and behold</n> הַגֶּ֨פֶן <sup>1612 </sup> <n>and behold this vine</n> הַזֹּ֜את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> כָּֽפְנָ֧ה <sup>3719 </sup> <n>did bend</n> שָׁרֳשֶׁ֣יהָ <sup>8328 </sup> <n>her roots</n> עָלָ֗יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>toward</n> וְדָֽלִיּוֹתָיו֙ <sup>1808 </sup> <n>her branches</n> שִׁלְחָה־ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>toward him and shot forth</n> לּ֔וֹ לְהַשְׁק֣וֹת <sup>8248 </sup> <n>toward him that he might water</n> אוֹתָ֔הּ <sup>853 </sup> מֵעֲרֻג֖וֹת <sup>6170 </sup> <n>it by the furrows</n> מַטָּעָֽהּ׃ <sup>4302 </sup> <n>of her plantation</n>
8: אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>beside</n> שָׂ֥דֶה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>soil</n> טּ֛וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>in a good</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>beside</n> מַ֥יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>waters</n> רַבִּ֖ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>by great</n> הִ֣יא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>it was</n> שְׁתוּלָ֑ה <sup>8362 </sup> <n>It was planted</n> לַעֲשׂ֤וֹת <sup>6213 </sup> <n>that it might bring forth</n> עָנָף֙ <sup>6057 </sup> <n>branches</n> וְלָשֵׂ֣את <sup>5375 </sup> <n>and that it might bear</n> פֶּ֔רִי <sup>6529 </sup> <n>fruit</n> לִהְי֖וֹת <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לְגֶ֥פֶן <sup>1612 </sup> <n>vine</n> אַדָּֽרֶת׃ <sup>155 </sup> <n>that it might be a goodly</n> ס

17: וְלֹא֩ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> בְחַ֨יִל <sup>2428 </sup> <n>army</n> גָּד֜וֹל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>with [his] mighty</n> וּבְקָהָ֣ל <sup>6951 </sup> <n>company</n> רָ֗ב <sup>7227 </sup> <n>and great</n> יַעֲשֶׂ֨ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>make</n> אוֹת֤וֹ <sup>853 </sup> פַרְעֹה֙ <sup>6547 </sup> <n>Neither shall Pharaoh</n> בַּמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>for him in the war</n> בִּשְׁפֹּ֥ךְ <sup>8210 </sup> <n>by casting up</n> סֹלְלָ֖ה <sup>5550 </sup> <n>mounts</n> וּבִבְנ֣וֹת <sup>1129 </sup> <n>and building</n> דָּיֵ֑ק <sup>1785 </sup> <n>forts</n> לְהַכְרִ֖ית <sup>3772 </sup> <n>to cut off</n> נְפָשׁ֥וֹת <sup>5315 </sup> <n>persons</n> רַבּֽוֹת׃ <sup>7227 </sup> <n>many</n>
18: וּבָזָ֥ה <sup>959 </sup> <n>Seeing he despised</n> אָלָ֖ה <sup>423 </sup> <n>the oath</n> לְהָפֵ֣ר <sup>6565 </sup> <n>by breaking</n> בְּרִ֑ית <sup>1285 </sup> <n>the covenant</n> וְהִנֵּ֨ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>and behold</n> נָתַ֥ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>when lo he had given</n> יָד֛וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>his hand</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֵ֥לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> עָשָׂ֖ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and hath done</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> יִמָּלֵֽט׃ <sup>4422 </sup> <n>all these [things] he shall not escape</n> ס
19: לָכֵ֞ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Therefore</n> כֹּה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>thus</n> אָמַ֨ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Therefore thus saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִה֮ <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> חַי־ <sup>2416 </sup> <n>[As] I live</n> אָנִי֒ <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>lo</n> לֹ֗א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אָֽלָתִי֙ <sup>423 </sup> <n>surely mine oath</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> בָּזָ֔ה <sup>959 </sup> <n>that he hath despised</n> וּבְרִיתִ֖י <sup>1285 </sup> <n>and my covenant</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> הֵפִ֑יר <sup>6331 </sup> <n>that he hath broken</n> וּנְתַתִּ֖יו <sup>5414 </sup> <n>even it will I recompense</n> בְּרֹאשֽׁוֹ׃ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>upon his own head</n>
20: וּפָרַשְׂתִּ֤י <sup>6566 </sup> <n>And I will spread</n> עָלָיו֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> רִשְׁתִּ֔י <sup>7568 </sup> <n>my net</n> וְנִתְפַּ֖שׂ <sup>8610 </sup> <n>upon him and he shall be taken</n> בִּמְצֽוּדָתִ֑י <sup>4686 </sup> <n>in my snare</n> וַהֲבִיאוֹתִ֣יהוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and I will bring</n> בָבֶ֗לָה <sup>894 </sup> <n>him to Babylon</n> וְנִשְׁפַּטְתִּ֤י <sup>8199 </sup> <n>and will plead</n> אִתּוֹ֙ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> שָׁ֔ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> מַעֲל֖וֹ <sup>4603 </sup> <n>with him there for his trespass</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> מָֽעַל־ <sup>4604 </sup> <n>that he hath trespassed</n> בִּֽי׃
21: וְאֵ֨ת <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> [מִבְרָחֹו כ] (מִבְרָחָ֤יו <sup>4015 </sup> <n>fugitive</n> ק) בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֲגַפָּיו֙ <sup>102 </sup> <n>with all his bands</n> בַּחֶ֣רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>by the sword</n> יִפֹּ֔לוּ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>shall fall</n> וְהַנִּשְׁאָרִ֖ים <sup>7604 </sup> <n>and they that remain</n> לְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>to every</n> ר֣וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>toward all winds</n> יִפָּרֵ֑שׂוּ <sup>6566 </sup> <n>shall be scattered</n> וִידַעְתֶּ֕ם <sup>3045 </sup> <n>and ye shall know</n> כִּ֛י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> אֲנִ֥י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>that I the LORD</n> דִּבַּֽרְתִּי׃ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>have spoken</n> ס
22: כֹּ֤ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִ֔ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> וְלָקַ֣חְתִּי <sup>3947 </sup> <n>I will also take</n> אָ֗נִי <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> מִצַּמֶּ֧רֶת <sup>6788 </sup> <n>of the highest branch</n> הָאֶ֛רֶז <sup>730 </sup> <n>cedar</n> הָרָמָ֖ה <sup>7311 </sup> <n>of the high</n> וְנָתָ֑תִּי <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and will set</n> מֵרֹ֤אשׁ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>from the top</n> יֹֽנְקוֹתָיו֙ <sup>3127 </sup> <n>of his young twigs</n> רַ֣ךְ <sup>7390 </sup> <n>a tender one</n> אֶקְטֹ֔ף <sup>6998 </sup> <n>[it] I will crop off</n> וְשָׁתַ֣לְתִּי <sup>8362 </sup> <n>and will plant</n> אָ֔נִי <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> עַ֥ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> הַר־ <sup>2022 </sup> <n>mountain</n> גָּבֹ֖הַ <sup>1364 </sup> <n>[it] upon an high</n> וְתָלֽוּל׃ <sup>8524 </sup> <n>and eminent</n>
23: בְּהַ֨ר <sup>2022 </sup> <n>In the mountain</n> מְר֤וֹם <sup>4791 </sup> <n>of the height</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> אֶשְׁתֳּלֶ֔נּוּ <sup>8362 </sup> <n>will I plant</n> וְנָשָׂ֤א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>it and it shall bring forth</n> עָנָף֙ <sup>6057 </sup> <n>boughs</n> וְעָ֣שָׂה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and bear</n> פֶ֔רִי <sup>6529 </sup> <n>fruit</n> וְהָיָ֖ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>and become</n> לְאֶ֣רֶז <sup>730 </sup> <n>cedar</n> אַדִּ֑יר <sup>117 </sup> <n>and be a goodly</n> וְשָׁכְנ֣וּ <sup>7931 </sup> <n>and under it shall dwell</n> תַחְתָּ֗יו <sup>8478 </sup> <n>under</n> כֹּ֚ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of every</n> צִפּ֣וֹר <sup>6833 </sup> <n>all fowl</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of every</n> כָּנָ֔ף <sup>3671 </sup> <n>of every wing</n> בְּצֵ֥ל <sup>6738 </sup> <n>in the shadow</n> דָּלִיּוֹתָ֖יו <sup>1808 </sup> <n>of the branches</n> תִּשְׁכֹּֽנָּה׃ <sup>7931 </sup> <n>thereof shall they dwell</n>
24: וְֽיָדְע֞וּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>shall know</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> עֲצֵ֣י <sup>6086 </sup> <n>And all the trees</n> הַשָּׂדֶ֗ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>of the field</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> אֲנִ֤י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>that I the LORD</n> הִשְׁפַּ֣לְתִּי ׀ <sup>8213 </sup> <n>have brought down</n> עֵ֣ץ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>tree</n> גָּבֹ֗הַ <sup>1364 </sup> <n>the high</n> הִגְבַּ֙הְתִּי֙ <sup>1361 </sup> <n>have exalted</n> עֵ֣ץ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>tree</n> שָׁפָ֔ל <sup>8217 </sup> <n>the low</n> הוֹבַ֙שְׁתִּי֙ <sup>3001 </sup> <n>have dried</n> עֵ֣ץ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>tree</n> לָ֔ח <sup>3892 </sup> <n>up the green</n> וְהִפְרַ֖חְתִּי <sup>6524 </sup> <n>to flourish</n> עֵ֣ץ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>tree</n> יָבֵ֑שׁ <sup>3002 </sup> <n>and have made the dry</n> אֲנִ֥י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>I the LORD</n> דִּבַּ֥רְתִּי <sup>1696 </sup> <n>have spoken</n> וְעָשִֽׂיתִי׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and have done</n> פ
